works.description: Written content authored by writers at BuzzFocus.com is being scraped and posted without attribution. This site is ranking higher in the search results for these articles when they're all stolen. In the case of the URL provided below, this site is completely stealing our entire feed and then they link to different author name as if they've written it. We were slammed with the Caffeine/Panda update and seeing our copied content rank higher is quite disconcerting.
